column2: Taken by Fatandira from the tomb of the Liche Lord Karitamen in the Borderlands, this pair of Nehekharan Khopeshes magically enhance their owner's combat skills, and weakens anyone struck by them.

This ancient magical lamellar cuirass is said to have belonged to a legendary warrior queen of the Scythans who killed one of the great Priest Kings of Ancient Nehekhara in battle. The Scythans, believing Fatandira to be a reincarnation of that queen, have granted to her this ancient artifact.
Born to a family of Arabyan caravan nomads, Fatandira is as comfortable on the saddle as on foot.

Given to Fatandira as a gift by the Scythans, Saqir is a mighty specimen of Desert Roc, giant and intelligent birds of prey that fly high above the deserts of Araby. The animal quickly bonded with her, and now they soar the battlefield together.
